meta.title: From MALTESE to FALCON
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: August is the "dog days" of summer, so we're featuring Raddles built around dog breeds. The Maltese, despite its name, might not actually have originated in the island country of Malta. It’s a tiny, white dog with a glossy coat — and it’s hypoallergenic, which is good news to those with dog allergies. And who wouldn’t want to cuddle with a dog that looks like a teddy bear?
